sentences.english: Technical education of higher engineering colleges was discussed.

sentences.english: This small academy is one of the schools the Moore project works with.

sentences.english: After graduating from Whittier Academy , my mother went on to Whittier College.

sentences.english: Therefore, the aim of this study is to investigate specific learning beliefs held by five-year junior college students majoring in Applied English.

sentences.english: The magazine also rates liberal arts colleges and other post-secondary schools.
